@IrstenKMullen and I make a detailed contribution to the case for reparations for black American descendants of U.S. slavery in @TheEconomist, with an emphasis on the unique power of reparations to close the racial wealth gap. https://t.co/OEtPT5MLlv

The usual hostile responses from the voices mechanically poised to attack black reparations follow in tow both on Twitter and elsewhere. Perhaps someday these folk will be willing to engage in a serious conversation about this social debt. Or not.
